title: About
text: Passionate about building scalable and efficient solutions, I specialize in both software development and DevOps. From crafting modular Flutter applications to managing cloud infrastructure, I bridge the gap between development and operations to drive seamless deployments and system reliability.

section.title: Software Development
section.content: Building modular and high-performance applications using Flutter, with a focus on scalability, maintainability, and a smooth user experience.

section.title: DevOps
section.content: Experienced in cloud infrastructure and automation, leveraging AWS, Azure, Kubernetes, Terraform, Grafana, and other tools to optimize deployments, monitoring, and system reliability.
